# owlR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/owlr)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=owlr)
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install this package from [GitHub](https://GitHub.com) with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("PrecisionHealthIntelligence/owlR")
```

## Example

```{r example,message=F,warning=F}
library(owlR)
library(reticulate)
library(tidyverse) 


test_owl <-
  read_owl(
    file.path(
      system.file(
        package = "owlR", "owl"),
      "test.owl")
  )
test_owl$`rdf:RDF`$`rdf:Description` %>%
  py_to_r()


```
